relationships.description: Harry sees the Ministry of Magic's logo on the wings of the memos.
Mr. Weasley mentions that owls were replaced by interdepartmental memos.
The Ministry of Magic is affiliated with the Department of International Magical Cooperation, as mentioned in the lift's announcement.
The International Magical Trading Standards Body is part of the Department of International Magical Cooperation, as mentioned in the lift's announcement.
The International Magical Office of Law is part of the Department of International Magical Cooperation, as mentioned in the lift's announcement.
The International Confederation of Wizards is affiliated with the Department of International Magical Cooperation, as mentioned in the lift's announcement.
